languages.text: "Ха. Это была бы смешная шалость!" {n}Взгляд девочки чуть оживляется.{/n} "Но я не шалю. Это сделал кто-то другой. Может, сам Фиделио просто тихо прокрался? Или кто-то написал такой, кого нет в списке гостей, но на кого никто не подумает?"

"Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"
languages.original_text: "Ха. Это была бы смешная шалость!" {n}Взгляд девочки чуть оживляется.{/n} "Но я не шалю. Это сделал кто-то другой. Может, сам Фиделио просто тихо прокрался? Или кто-то написал такой, кого нет в списке гостей, но на кого никто не подумает?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

"Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

"Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

"Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

"Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

languages.text: “哈，这个恶作剧可真有意思！”{n}她的眼睛亮了起来。{/n}“但我从来不做恶作剧，是别人干的。会不会是菲迪奥偷偷干的？或者说，会不会是某个不在名单上，但也不会引人怀疑的人干的？”
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: “哈，这个恶作剧可真有意思！”{n}她的眼睛亮了起来。{/n}“但我从来不做恶作剧，是别人干的。会不会是菲迪奥偷偷干的？或者说，会不会是某个不在名单上，但也不会引人怀疑的人干的？”

languages.text: «Ja. ¡Habría sido muy gracioso!». {n}Su mirada se ilumina un poco.{/n} «Pero yo no gasto bromas. Ha sido otra persona. A lo mejor lo ha hecho Fidelio con mucho cuidado. O alguien que no salga en la lista, pero que tampoco sea sospechoso».
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: «Ja. ¡Habría sido muy gracioso!». {n}Su mirada se ilumina un poco.{/n} «Pero yo no gasto bromas. Ha sido otra persona. A lo mejor lo ha hecho Fidelio con mucho cuidado. O alguien que no salga en la lista, pero que tampoco sea sospechoso».

languages.text: 「ふふ。面白いいたずら！」{n}彼女の目が少しだけ輝いた。{/n}「でも、私はいたずらしないよ。他の誰かじゃないかな。フィデリオって人がこっそり書いたんじゃない？それか、本に名前も載ってなくて誰にも気づかれないような人が書いたとか？」
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふふ。面白いいたずら！」{n}彼女の目が少しだけ輝いた。{/n}「でも、私はいたずらしないよ。他の誰かじゃないかな。フィデリオって人がこっそり書いたんじゃない？それか、本に名前も載ってなくて誰にも気づかれないような人が書いたとか？」

languages.text: "Ha! Das wäre ein lustiger Streich!" {n}Ihre Miene hellt sich ein wenig auf.{/n} "Aber ich spiele keine Streiche. Das war jemand anderes. Vielleicht Fidelio, ganz unauffällig? Oder jemand, der nicht auf der Liste steht, den aber auch niemand verdächtigt?"
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Das wäre ein lustiger Streich!" {n}Ihre Miene hellt sich ein wenig auf.{/n} "Aber ich spiele keine Streiche. Das war jemand anderes. Vielleicht Fidelio, ganz unauffällig? Oder jemand, der nicht auf der Liste steht, den aber auch niemand verdächtigt?"

languages.text: « Ha ! Ça aurait été bien drôle ! {n}s'exclame-t-elle, les yeux pétillants de malice.{/n} Mais je ne fais pas de farces comme ça. C'était quelqu'un d'autre. Fidélio, peut-être ? Ou alors, quelqu'un qui n'était pas sur la liste, mais que personne ne suspecterait ? »
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Ça aurait été bien drôle ! {n}s'exclame-t-elle, les yeux pétillants de malice.{/n} Mais je ne fais pas de farces comme ça. C'était quelqu'un d'autre. Fidélio, peut-être ? Ou alors, quelqu'un qui n'était pas sur la liste, mais que personne ne suspecterait ? »

languages.text: "Hah. Ne komik şaka olurdu!" {n}Gözleri hafiften parlıyor.{/n} "Ama ben şaka yapmam. Başkasıdır. Belki o Fidelio yazmıştır. Kimseye çaktırmadan. O değilse de adı listede olmayan ama kimsenin şüphelenmeyeceği biridir, olamaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "Ha. That would've been a funny prank!" {n}Her eyes light up a little.{/n} "But I don't play pranks. It was someone else. Maybe Fidelio did it, very quietly? Or maybe it was someone who's not on the list, but also someone nobody would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: "Hah. Komik bir şaka olurdu!" {n}Gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Ama ben şaka yapmam. Başkası olmalı. Belki Fidelio çok sessizce yapmıştır. Ya da belki adı listede olmayan ama kimsenin şüphelenmeyeceği biri yapmıştır."
